segments.text: I can't help but feel down about this kitchen situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing quietly, like a silent cry for help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, missing the problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her unawareness makes me worry for her safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking it all for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool under the boy looks ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant face tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a treat, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the garden reminds me of better times.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed chaos feels lonely in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage and potential fallsâ€”it's all so avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt in this moment of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic routine hides these sad little hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
